Package ru.nsu.romanov.recordbook

Class RecordBook

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.romanov.recordbook.RecordBook
public class RecordBook extends Object
Record book for FIT NSU. Name of students and subject must be unique.

  • Method Details

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent(String studentFullName)
      Getter for student.
      Parameters:
      studentFullName - name of student.
      Returns:
      student with name studentFullName.

    • getSubject

      public Subject getSubject(String subjectName)
      Getter fr subject.
      Parameters:
      subjectName - name of subject.
      Returns:
      subject with name subjectName.

    • addStudent

      public boolean addStudent(String studentFullName, Semester semester)
      Method which add new student. index will be taken from list freeIndexes or least free index.
      Parameters:
      studentFullName - name of student.
      semester - semester in which student studies.
      Returns:
      true if student was made, false if there is a student with this name.

    • transferSemester

      public boolean transferSemester(String studentFullName, Semester semester)
      Transfer student to Semester semester.
      Parameters:
      studentFullName - name of student.
      semester - semester to transfer.
      Returns:
      true if student was transferred, false if there is no such student, or student is in this Semester.

    • removeStudent

      public boolean removeStudent(String studentFullName)
      remove student and all his marks.
      Parameters:
      studentFullName - name of student.
      Returns:
      true student is removed, false if there is no such student.

    • getStudentMark

      public Mark getStudentMark(String studentName, String subjectName)
      Get student with name studentName mark for subject with name subjectName.
      Parameters:
      studentName - name of student.
      subjectName - name of subject.
      Returns:
      Mark (Undefined if there is no info about mark), null if this student or subject not exist.

    • StudentInfo

      public String StudentInfo(String studentFullName)
      Write student info into string and return it.
      Parameters:
      studentFullName - name of student.
      Returns:
      "" if this student not exist, otherwise info.

    • isPossibleToHaveRedDiploma

      public boolean isPossibleToHaveRedDiploma(String studentFullName)
      Method to find is possible to have red diploma. if type of subject is Test mark not important expect TWO. if mark is retake so it's not important. if avr of marks is less than 4.8 then false. if there is at least one three or two than false.
      Parameters:
      studentFullName - name of student.
      Returns:
      true if is possible to have red diploma, otherwise false.

    • isPossibleToHaveIncreasedScholarship

      public boolean isPossibleToHaveIncreasedScholarship(String studentFullName)
      Method which calc is possible to hav increased scholarship. if type of subject is Test mark not important expect TWO. if mark is retake so false. if there is at least one three or two than false.
      Parameters:
      studentFullName - name of student.
      Returns:
      true if is possible to hav increased scholarship, otherwise false.

    • addSubject

      public boolean addSubject(String subjectName, Semester semester, TypeSubject typeObject)
      Add new subject. index is taken from list free indexes if it's not empty, otherwise is taken the least.
      Parameters:
      subjectName - name of subject.
      semester - semester of subject.
      typeObject - type of this subject.
      Returns:
      true if subject is added, false if there is a subject with this name.

    • removeSubject

      public boolean removeSubject(String subjectName)
      Remove subject from record book. add this index to free index list. also remove all marks.
      Parameters:
      subjectName - name of subject.
      Returns:
      true if this subject was removed, false if there is no subject with name subjectName.

    • setStudentMark

      public boolean setStudentMark(String subjectName, String studentFullName, Mark mark)
      Set student mark for subject subjectName for student studentFullName.
      Parameters:
      subjectName - name of subject.
      studentFullName - name of student.
      mark - mark to set.
      Returns:
      true if mark was set, false if there is no subject or student.
